title: Dozens dead after Brazil crackdown on gangs and drug traffickers
description: Dozens of people have been killed in clashes in Brazil as police carry out raids to crack down on criminal gangs and drug traffickers.

title: Two-hour daily phone limit for under 18s proposed by Chinese regulator
description: Chinese regulators have proposed rules that would limit under 18s to a maximum of two hours a day on their smartphones.

title: QAnon Shaman tells Sky News Donald Trump charges over January 6 riot may backfire on prosecutors
description: The latest case against Donald Trump could backfire against prosecutors, the man who famously wore a horned helmet during the January 6 2021 riot at the US Capitol has told Sky News.

title: Justin Trudeau and wife separate after 18 years of marriage
description: Justin Trudeau and his wife Sophie have announced they are separating after 18 years of marriage.

title: Greek PM offers free holiday to tourists who fled Rhodes wildfires
description: Greece's prime minister has offered a week-long free holiday in Rhodes next year for tourists whose vacation was cut short by wildfires.

title: Killer who shot 11 people in attack on synagogue will be sentenced to death
description: A gunman will be sentenced to death after killing 11 worshippers at a synagogue in Pittsburgh in the deadliest antisemitic attack in US history.

title: Ancient whale species 'may be heaviest animal that ever lived'
description: Blue whales have always been considered record breakers when it comes to the size department.

title: Four stowaways travel 3,500 miles in tiny space on cargo ship - but not to their intended destination
description: Four Nigerian stowaways survived two weeks in the tiny space above the rudder of a cargo ship as it travelled 3,500 miles of ocean from their home country to Brazil.

title: Perseid meteor shower to peak - here's how, where and when
description: We are a couple of weeks into the Perseid meteor shower - but the best is yet to come, offering stargazers a chance to see one of the most dramatic displays of the year.

title: UK foreign aid cuts could lead to thousands of deaths, report warns
description: Hundreds of thousands more women will face unsafe abortions and thousands will die in pregnancy and childbirth as a result of cuts to the UK's overseas budget, ministers have been warned.

title: Supermoon dazzles viewers around the world as stargazers enjoy rare lunar event
description: Stargazers across the world have been enjoying the first of two rarely-seen supermoons in the space of a month.

title: Vegan influencer 'dies of starvation' after decade of only eating raw fruit and vegetables
description: A "raw vegan" influencer has reportedly died from starvation after a decade of only eating fruit and vegetables.

title: 'Cancer-killing pill' that appears to 'annihilate' solid tumours is now being tested on humans
description: A "cancer-killing pill" has appeared to "annihilate" solid tumours in early research - leaving healthy cells unaffected.
